noun.description: A member of either of two North American peoples, the (Upper) Pima living chiefly along the Gila and Salt rivers of southern Arizona, and the Lower Pima of central Sonora.
The Uto-Aztecan languages of the Pima.

adjective.description: Relating to the Pima or their languages.

origin: Spanish, shortening of Pimahito, from Pima pimahaitu nothing.
